page.title: 04LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: Industry On the Daneshill Industrial Estate there are a number of light engineering works.They manufacture tea and coffee dispensing machines, plastics,light metalwork, house extensions, spray products, roofing felt and sound proofing and scaffolding.There is also a cement and a paper works. There are some firms who use their space for storage and some who have mainly offices. The Kingsland Industrial Estate is a more recent industrial area. Parts of it are still being built. It has a mixture of warehouses, office, light engineering and small chemical works. Along the side of Wade Rd. there is a large council waste depot.
